issue.title: [C++] Don't throw exception in arrow/util/thread-pool.h
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3017](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3017). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would indicate that the developer has used the thread pool improperly. I would recommend using `std::abort` instead of throwing a `std::runtime_error`.
